name: The Quick Run - WWII Operations
description:
January 22nd, 1941, Allied Forces took Tobruk, Libya from the hands of the Italian 10th Army during Operation Compass. A month later, Operation Sonnenblume was conducted by the German Afrika Korps. With a lack of supplies and men, the British would have to fend of against Rommel's countless fierce attacks for the upcoming months of this forsaken war.

This is the Siege of Tobruk.

W.W.II Operations: The Quick Run is both a video game, and a documentary, to give players both an entertaining and educational experience about the earlier battles fought in North Africa, especially the fight over Tobruk, a port city that holds many strategic values to both the Allies and Axis, for over half a year.

You, the player, will get to experience the war through the eyes of British Corporal Thomas Wilson, a soldier who's seen heat on the desert.
